title: Software Engineer
aboutDescription:
I am currently a Software Engineering student at Metropolia, working toward my bachelor's degree. At the same time, I work as a freelance software developer, building websites and applications.

Here are the most important technologies I have worked with:

experienceBoxes.title: Software Developer
experienceBoxes.text: I work independently on websites and web applications. I am responsible for both front-end and back-end development, and I handle project planning, technical implementation, and client collaboration.

experienceBoxes.title: Processing Operator
experienceBoxes.text: I was responsible for inspecting and repairing electronic components. Workdays lasted 12 hours and I needed to stay alert and focused to ensure that the final products were flawless and of high quality.

projectsCards.name: MenStyle
projectsCards.description: A website for a barber shop chain in Finland with 9 locations across the country.
projectsCards.techstack: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, AWS, CSS

projectsCards.name: EcoPlug
projectsCards.description: A mobile app that helps users find available electric vehicle charging spots in Uusimaa.
projectsCards.techstack: React Native, Javascript, CSS, Node.js, Jenkins, Docker, MySQL

projectsCards.name: Tuutorikeskus
projectsCards.description: A website that provides guidance and support to students for their medical entrance exams.

projectsCards.name: Sähkö Dominus
projectsCards.description: A website made for a client offering professional electronic installation and repair services.
